channel.title: Npc Respawn
channel.description:
[size=14pt]Hi, i was wondering.. All the servers have Respawning npc's after death or npcreset. [/size] [size=13pt]Where could i get a code, to put in client.java or the file your suppost to put it in[/size]
[size=15pt]And name the difficulty level so i dont get confused.[/size]
[size=16pt]thanks =0[/size]

item.title: Npc Respawn
item.dc:creator: @noobspure50 noobspure50
item.description:
@noobspure50 wrote:

wow
autospawn.cfg
so then you will se something like this

spawn = 117 2907 2723 0 2911 2727 2865 2719 1
basically what this means ,
//-----npc----Xcoord-----Ycoord----floor-------1---------------2------------3----------4---------------5----------6//
spawn = 117 means the Npc Id
the 2907, and 2723 is the X and Y coord,
the 0 means Height level,
the 2911, 2727, 2865, 2719,
pretty much means how it walks,
like some npcs will walk automaticly like moveing around, ect, Just Leave the 1 where it is,
I think it has something to do with Height

if you dont know how to do the walking just make it look like this

spawn = ####	Xcoord	Ycoord	0	0	0	0	1

goodluck

Read full topic

it isnt that hard you just use words that dont make sense
